short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser Wallet for Aleo powered by FoxWallet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A browser-based crypto wallet powered by FoxWallet team.

An open-source Chrome extension wallet enables syncing locally, in-browser access, and support for decentralized applications, empowering users to explore the Web3 world.

We enable users to create and manage their own identities while ensuring the security of their private keys. We guarantee that every transaction will be conducted under the user's authorization.

Currently, we only support the Aleo network, with more features along the way. Stay tuned!
